S

SAVE_ENABLED - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Main
Saves game to a file upon exit if true, pernamently discards game upon exit if false.
setAmount(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Item
Sets the amount of Items the stack of it contains, then updates the Item's BitmapText representation of the amount (number).
setBarPicture(Picture) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
setClickedItem(Item) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Window
 
setControl(RigidBodyControl) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Item

setCurrentChunkY(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Game
 
setCurrentItem(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Inventory
 
setHealth(float) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
 
setLightLevel(float) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Note: In order for the effects to be applied, call updateVertices()
setLightLevel(Spatial, float) - Static method in class alston.minecraft.Utility
Sets the verticies of the given Spatial if it's a Geometry to the given lightLevel.
setLocation(int, int, int, Chunk) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Puts the block in the specified location within the specified chunk.
setLocation(int, int, int, Chunk) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Torch

setSpatial(Spatial) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Used for non-Cube Blocks only
setSpatial(Spatial) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Item

setTime(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Game
 
setTransparent(boolean) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
 
setup() - Method in class alston.minecraft.SlotArea
Instantiates Items in every index of items and adds the Item's Picture to the picturesNode.
setup(SlotArea, SlotArea) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Window
 
setupFromFile(Chunk) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Sets up the Block's spatial and material from loading from a file
setupFromFile(Chunk) - Method in class alston.minecraft.CraftingTable
Adds an additional level by restoring the other Objects as well.
setupLighting() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Sunlight
Adds a PointLight to every single x and z component at the surfaceHeight.
setupSpatial() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Mob
Sets up the spatial at de-serialization.
setupSpatial() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Zombie
 
show() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Block
Adds the block to the Chunk's node and marks it as not hidden.
show() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Window
Shows the inventory on the GUI.
Showable - Interface in alston.minecraft
States that the Object that implements this can open a window and must implement a close() method.
simpleInitApp() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Main
Called by the super class SimpleApplication upon creation to set up variables and Objects, as well as calling initialization methods for the title screen.
SimpleItem - Class in alston.minecraft
Objects of this class represents Items that have no special features, and do not become Blocks.
SimpleItem(int, Spatial, Picture) - Constructor for class alston.minecraft.SimpleItem
Creates a new SimpleItem with the given type and Spatial, and default maxAmount value of 64.
simpleUpdate(float) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Main
Called by the SimpleApplication super class for every frame.
SlotArea - Class in alston.minecraft
Abstract representation of a sqauare area in the GUI that contains slots for Items and handles all interactions with them.
SlotArea(int, int, Node) - Constructor for class alston.minecraft.SlotArea
Creates a new representation of a square are of GUI which contains slots for Items.
sortKeys() - Method in class alston.minecraft.RecipeMap
Sorts the keys according to the Object's comparator (MUST be called before searching).
spatialMap - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Mob
Maps all the Mob's spatials to themseleves for collision detection.
STICK - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
STONE - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
STONE_AXE - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
STONE_PICKAXE - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
STONE_SHOVEL - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
STONE_SWORD - Static variable in class alston.minecraft.Item
 
stop() - Method in class alston.minecraft.Main
Called whenever the program is PROPERLY exited; saves the current Game to a file if SAVE_ENABLED is true, or else it does nothing.
substractHealth(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Mob
Substracts the given health from this mob's health
substractHealth(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.Zombie
 
subtractHealth(int) - Method in class alston.minecraft.HealthBar
Checks for death then substracts health from the Player if he is not dead.
Sunlight - Class in alston.minecraft
A Sunlight as defined by this class proporgates light from the top to bottom of every X/Z components in the 3D Vector Space, and will put a Light on the Block that it hits.
Sunlight(Chunk, float) - Constructor for class alston.minecraft.Sunlight
Creates a new Sunlight; Note that setupLighting() must be called at least once on a full Chunk in order for the effects to apply.
